item.title: Install and Configure Drone CI
item.description: Intro In this Post i want to Describe How to Install and Confiure drone-ci in a Kubernetes Cluster. What is Drone CI ? Drone CI is a tool for Continuous Integration with many Plugins docker hugo terraform ansible some notification and more. If you don’t want to setup a Complete CI/CD solution like GitLab and you have a git solution like gitea otherwise it’s possible to use a Public Repo GitHub for example.
